name: SCP:Chronicles 0.0.6
description:
SCP:Chronicles is a library of everything relating to the SCP Foundation. Games, movies, SCP monster are all documented in the project.

Make sure to join the discord to gain information on further updates and to join the community: https://discord.gg/VkWJ97xY2v

Note: This is in very early access so expect to find missing content. All works in this software are not created but are used from the SCP wiki and works are credited in the credits section. All works contained in this software are released under CC-BY-SA..

SCP Wiki link: http://www.scpwiki.com
